title: NFL teams ranked by number of Super Bowl appearances all time 2020
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of Super Bowl appearances for 28 number of Teams.
The maximum Number of Super Bowl appearances 11.0 is found at Team New England Patriots and the minimum is found at New Orleans Saints where Team is 1.0.
The difference of Number of Super Bowl appearances between the highest and lowest Team is 10.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 28 columns on the x axis representing Team, and Number of Super Bowl appearances in each Team on the y axis.
Team New England Patriots has the highest Number of Super Bowl appearances and New Orleans Saints has the lowest Number of Super Bowl appearances.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Team in the x axis and Number of Super Bowl appearances in the y axis.
Team New England Patriots has the highest Number of Super Bowl appearances and New Orleans Saints has the lowest Number of Super Bowl appearances.
The Number of Super Bowl appearances of Team New Orleans Saints is 11.0% smaller than the maximum value at New England Patriots.
Number of Super Bowl appearances at Team New England Patriots is 11.0 , second place is Denver Broncos at 8.0, and thirdly is Denver Broncos at 8.0.
Team New Orleans Saints, Arizona Cardinals, Tennessee Titans, Tampa Bay Buccaneers, Los Angeles Chargers, and New York Jets have a similar Number of Super Bowl appearances that is 1.0.
